original_title: トモダチゲーム 劇場版
overview: This is a continuation of Friends Games. Now the group of friends realises they have fallen into this game and they are in the second set of game, Kageguchi Sugoroku. Will Katagiri Yuichi find out who led them into this deceptive game between money and friends?
tagline: In order to win the Friends Game, you can't doubt your friends.
title: Friends Games: The Movie
